practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Aviation Accidents|Consumer Litigation & Class Actions|Dangerous Property & Products|Medical Malpractice|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Construction Accidents
description:
As a strictly personal injury law firm, Clifford Law Offices P.C. in Chicago, Illinois, has the resources and talent to fight for and obtain maximum compensation on the behalves of injured parties. We are no stranger to complex cases and, in fact, revel in the opportunity to hold large corporations accountable for their negligence and wrongdoings. When individuals feel powerless after an injury or loss and in the face of costly litigation, we step in and serve as the voice and advocate they so desperately need and deserve.

From car accidents to product liability to medical malpractice, the team at our law offices has the experience and drive to protect clients' interests in a variety of cases. Our capabilities extend to the following areas:
• Aviation and mass transit accidents
• Consumer litigation and class actions
• Dangerous property and products
• Motor vehicle accidents
• Construction accidents
• Animal bites
• Asbestos mesothelioma
• Birth injuries
• Brain injuries
• Construction accidents
• Nursing home abuse
• Railroad worker injuries - FELA
• Sexual abuse
• Trucking accidents
• Wrongful death

Our firm has won multimillion-dollar verdicts for high-profile cases. Clifford Law Offices P.C. routinely ranks as one of Chicago's most prestigious firms, and U.S. News & World Report saw fit to include us in its Best Law Firms guide for our outstanding results in such practice areas as product liability, medical malpractice and class-action lawsuits.
Our commitment to excellence is evident in everything from our thoroughness during each free initial consultation to our attentiveness during every in-person and virtual appointment and our long list of accolades and recognitions.
